0.name: Corkage Fee
0.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Fire DMG to a single enemy.

1.name: Nectar Blitz
1.fullDesc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy. Reduces the target's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{3}} turn(s).
1.shortDesc: Deals Fire DMG to a single enemy and reduces ATK.

0.name: Special Brew
0.fullDesc: Immediately heals a target ally for <orangeStrong>{{1}}</orangeStrong> HP.

0.name: Champagne Etiquette
0.fullDesc: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for {{2}} turn(s). At the same time, deals Fire DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies, and enhances his next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Inflicts Besotted</orangeStrong> on all enemies and deals Fire DMG to them at the same time. Enhances the next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.

0.name: Tipsy Tussle
0.fullDesc: The Besotted state makes targets receive <orangeStrong>{{1, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> more Break DMG. Every time a Besotted target gets attacked by an ally, the attacking ally's HP is restored by <orangeStrong>{{2}}</orangeStrong>.
0.shortDesc: The Besotted state <orangeStrong>makes targets receive more Break DMG</orangeStrong>. Every time the target gets attacked by an ally, <orangeStrong>the attacker's HP is restored</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Artisan Elixir
0.fullDesc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for {{1}} turn(s). And deals Fire DMG equal to {{2, percent}}% of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies.
0.shortDesc: Attacks the enemy. After entering battle, <orangeStrong>inflicts Besotted</orangeStrong> to all enemies and deals minor Fire DMG to all enemies.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Novel Concoction
0.fullDesc: Increases this unit's Outgoing Healing by an amount equal to {{1, percent}}% of Break Effect, up to a maximum Outgoing Healing increase of {{2, percent}}%.

0.name: Organic Yeast
0.fullDesc: After using the Ultimate, immediately Advances Forward this unit's Action by 100%.

0.name: Bottoms Up
0.fullDesc: When Gallagher uses Nectar Blitz to attack Besotted enemies, the HP Restore effect of his Talent will also apply to other allies for this time.

1.name: Salty Dog
1.desc: When entering the battle, Gallagher regenerates {{1}} Energy and increases Effect RES by {{2, percent}}%.

2.name: Lion's Tail
2.desc: When using the Skill, removes {{1}} debuff(s) from the target ally. At the same time, increases their Effect RES by {{2, percent}}%, lasting for {{3}} turn(s).

3.name: Corpse Reviver
3.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.name: Last Word
4.desc: Extends the duration of the Besotted state inflicted by Gallagher's Ultimate by {{1}} turn(s).

5.name: Death in the Afternoon
5.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

6.name: Blood and Sand
6.desc: Increases Gallagher's Break Effect by {{1, percent}}% and Weakness Break Efficiency by {{2, percent}}%.
